vesper.name: Vesper
vesper.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

bacardi.name: Bacardi
bacardi.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

negroni.name: Negroni
negroni.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

rose.name: Rose
rose.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

oldfashioned.name: Old Fashioned
oldfashioned.preparation: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.

tuxedo.name: Tuxedo
tuxedo.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

mojito.name: Mojito
mojito.preparation: Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

horsesneck.name: Horse's Neck
horsesneck.preparation: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

planterspunch.name: Planter's Punch
planterspunch.preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.

seabreeze.name: Sea Breeze
seabreeze.preparation: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

piscosour.name: Pisco Sour
piscosour.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

longislandicedtea.name: Long Island Iced Tea
longislandicedtea.preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

cloverclub.name: Clover Club
cloverclub.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

angelface.name: Angel Face
angelface.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

mimosa.name: Mimosa
mimosa.preparation: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

whiskeysour.name: Whiskey Sour
whiskeysour.garnish: Half an orange slice and cherry
whiskeysour.preparation: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
screwdriver.preparation: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cubalibre.name: Cuba Libre
cubalibre.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

manhattan.name: Manhattan
manhattan.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

portoflip.name: Porto Flip
portoflip.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

ginfizz.name: Gin Fizz
ginfizz.preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

espressomartini.name: Espresso Martini

recipe.special: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

espressomartini.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

margarita.name: Margarita
margarita.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

french75.name: French 75
french75.preparation: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

yellowbird.name: Yellow Bird
yellowbird.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

pinacolada.name: Pina Colada
pinacolada.preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

aviation.name: Aviation
aviation.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

bellini.name: Bellini
bellini.preparation: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

grasshopper.name: Grasshopper
grasshopper.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

tequilasunrise.name: Tequila Sunrise
tequilasunrise.preparation: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

daiquiri.name: Daiquiri
daiquiri.preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

rustynail.name: Rusty Nail
rustynail.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

b52.name: B52
b52.preparation: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

stinger.name: Stinger
stinger.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

goldendream.name: Golden Dream
goldendream.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

godmother.name: God Mother
godmother.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

spritzveneziano.name: Spritz Veneziano
spritzveneziano.preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

bramble.name: Bramble
bramble.preparation: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

alexander.name: Alexander
alexander.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

lemondropmartini.name: Lemon Drop Martini
lemondropmartini.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

frenchmartini.name: French Martini
frenchmartini.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

blackrussian.name: Black Russian
blackrussian.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

bloodymary.name: Bloody Mary
bloodymary.preparation: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.

maitai.name: Mai-tai
maitai.garnish: Pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime wedge
maitai.preparation: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.

sexonthebeach.name: Sex on the Beach
sexonthebeach.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

monkeygland.name: Monkey Gland
monkeygland.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

derby.name: Derby
derby.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

sidecar.name: Sidecar
sidecar.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

irishcoffee.name: Irish Coffee
irishcoffee.preparation: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

sazerac.name: Sazerac
sazerac.preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

americano.name: Americano
americano.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.

singaporesling.name: Singapore Sling
singaporesling.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.

frenchconnection.name: French Connection
frenchconnection.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

moscowmule.name: Moscow Mule

recipe.special: 1 slice lime in a highball glass

moscowmule.preparation: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.

johncollins.name: John Collins
johncollins.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

kir.name: Kir
kir.preparation: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

mintjulep.name: Mint Julep
mintjulep.preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.

tommysmargarita.name: Tommy's Margarita
tommysmargarita.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

paradise.name: Paradise
paradise.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

dirtymartini.name: Dirty Martini
dirtymartini.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.

champagnecocktail.name: Champagne Cocktail
champagnecocktail.preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.

marypickford.name: Mary Pickford
marypickford.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

hemingwayspecial.name: Hemingway Special
hemingwayspecial.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

darknstormy.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
darknstormy.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.

ramosfizz.name: Ramos Fizz
ramosfizz.preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

russianspringpunch.name: Russian Spring Punch
russianspringpunch.preparation: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.

godfather.name: God Father
godfather.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan
cosmopolitan.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

drymartini.name: Dry Martini
drymartini.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

betweenthesheets.name: Between the Sheets
betweenthesheets.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

casino.name: Casino
casino.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

caipirinha.name: Caipirinha

recipe.special: half fresh lime cut into 4 wedges

caipirinha.preparation: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

vampiro.name: Vampiro

recipe.special: Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers

vampiro.garnish: Lime wedge and a green or red chili
vampiro.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.

kamikaze.name: Kamikaze
kamikaze.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

whitelady.name: White Lady
whitelady.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.

harveywallbanger.name: Harvey Wallbanger
harveywallbanger.preparation: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.
